QuestData.Title: Materia Medica
QuestData.Description: Alright, Ken-Ken pretty sure he knows what wrong with pandaren! Got old, old hozen remedy that do the trick.$B$BNeed to mix honey, fish oil, and salt. Ken-Ken saw lots of beehives in the trees around town, and there must be fish left in the dry ponds.$B$BThat just leave salt... Mei might know where we can find some.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 4 Chunks of Honeycomb, 4 Slick Mudfish, and 4 Salty Cores from Zhu Province.
QuestData.CompletionText: Can't believe Ken-Ken did not think of this sooner. It's the ONE thing that can ruin his day...
QuestData.RewardText: Pandaren got a case of the spooky-dooks!$B$BDooks get scared sometimes, don't wanna come out. Poor, fluffy mopey-dopes must be ready to explode by now!$B$BThis just the thing to bring 'em out. That make pandaren happy for sure!$B$BJust like ol' gramma used to say: can't THROW if can't GO!
